EmailTemplate.subject: Final details for the Transformation Council: September 19-20, San Francisco
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Pivotal is pleased to be hosting you in San Francisco on September 19-20 for the Transformation Council Meeting and Workshop led by Eric Ries, author of The Lean Startup and The Leader’s Guide.
We will kick off the event with a private dinner on Monday evening at Perbacco, followed by a half day of transformation talks and a workshop on Tuesday morning. The attached excerpt from Eric Ries' latest book will be the focus of our session next week–thank you for reviewing prior to Tuesday's workshop.
Eric Ries Excerpt <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/rs/625-IUJ-009/images/TLG_Ch5_TxCouncil.pdf]]>
We recommend public transportation or ride sharing to both locations as street parking is limited and convention traffic at Moscone will be high. Dress code for the event is business casual. Should you have any further questions, please feel free to email us (pschmitt@pivotal.io <[[mailto:pschmitt@pivotal.io]]>). Full Agenda
Monday, September 19: Private Dinner Location: Perbacco <[[http://www.perbaccosf.com/]]>, 230 California Street, San Francisco, CA 94111, Mezzanine Level
6:30 pm–10:00 pm Networking and Socializing for Transformation Council members & attendees, Mezzanine Level
Tuesday, September 20: Transformation Talk & Workshop Location: The Pearl SF <[[http://thepearlsf.com/]]>, 601 19th St, San Francisco, CA 94107
8:00–8:30 am Breakfast and Introductions
8:30–9:00 am Introduction: Eric Ries
9:00–10:00 am First Exercise Workshop
10:00–10:15 am Break
10:15–11:30 am Second Exercise Workshop
11:30am–12:00 pm Discussion and Wrap-up
12:00 pm Lunch Served (Boxed lunch provided for those traveling)
We look forward to you joining us.
Pivotal
